PLAY.TITLE: The Tragedy of Romeo and Juliet

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: PARIS, a young nobleman, kinsman to the prince.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: heads of two houses at variance with each other.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: An old man, cousin to Capulet.
MERCUTIO, kinsman to the prince, and friend to Romeo.
BENVOLIO, nephew to Montague, and friend to Romeo.
Page to Paris; another Page; an officer.
Citizens of Verona; several Men and Women, relations to both houses; Maskers, Guards, Watchmen, and Attendants.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Verona. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter SAMPSON and GREGORY, of the house of Capulet,
armed with swords and bucklers

Enter, several of both houses, who join the fray;
then enter Citizens, with clubs
Enter CAPULET in his gown, and LADY CAPULET
Exeunt all but MONTAGUE, LADY MONTAGUE, and BENVOLIO

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A room in Capulet's house.
SCENE IV. A street.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter ROMEO, MERCUTIO, BENVOLIO, with five or six
Maskers, Torch-bearers, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. A hall in Capulet's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Musicians waiting. Enter Servingmen with napkins

Enter CAPULET, with JULIET and others of his house,
meeting the Guests and Maskers
Exeunt all but JULIET and Nurse

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A lane by the wall of Capulet's orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: He climbs the wall, and leaps down within it

SPEECH.SPEAKER: ROMEO
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: JULIET appears above at a window

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Friar Laurence's cell.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter FRIAR LAURENCE, with a basket

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A public place.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter MERCUTIO, BENVOLIO, Page, and Servants

TYBALT under ROMEO's arm stabs MERCUTIO, and flies
with his followers

Enter Prince, attended; MONTAGUE, CAPULET, their
Wives, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. A room in Capulet's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter CAPULET, LADY CAPULET, and PARIS

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Capulet's orchard.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter ROMEO and JULIET above, at the window

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Hall in Capulet's house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter CAPULET, LADY CAPULET, Nurse, and two
Servingmen

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Juliet's chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: She falls upon her bed, within the curtains

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Hall in Capulet's house.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CAPULET
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter three or four Servingmen, with spits, logs,
and baskets

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Juliet's chamber.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter FRIAR LAURENCE and PARIS, with Musicians
Exeunt CAPULET, LADY CAPULET, PARIS, and FRIAR LAURENCE

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A churchyard; in it a tomb belonging to the Capulets.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter PARIS, and his Page bearing flowers and a torch

Enter ROMEO and BALTHASAR, with a torch,
mattock, & c

Enter, at the other end of the churchyard, FRIAR
LAURENCE, with a lantern, crow, and spade
Falls on ROMEO's body, and dies
Enter Watch, with the Page of PARIS
Re-enter some of the Watch, with BALTHASAR
Re-enter others of the Watch, with FRIAR LAURENCE
Enter CAPULET, LADY CAPULET, and others
